definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
used in the transliteration of people's names

sentences.english: Lucy moved behind them and herded the trio toward the party.
sentences.chinese: 露茜在身后将他们仨赶进了屋。

sentences.english: Lucy's pencil-box is bigger than Lily's.
sentences.chinese: 露茜的铅笔盘比莉莉的大些。
你看上去像露茜的帽子。

sentences.english: At night Lucy started to GO through the bundle of letters that she received in the day.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，露茜开始看她白天收到的一扎信件。

sentences.english: I think you are a very good Faun.
sentences.chinese: 露茜说，“你是一个非常好的羊怪。

sentences.english: Lucy,put your shoes on!It is time to go home.
sentences.chinese: 露茜，穿上你的鞋!该回家了。

sentences.english: At last it burst on him in a letter from Lucy herself.
sentences.chinese: 最后，露茜在一封亲笔信中，突然向他。

sentences.english: Despite this warning, Hawking found it necessary to in clue one equation.
sentences.chinese: 不管这个警告，露茜发现必须引入一个公式。

sentences.english: Mike sits between Lucy and Helen.
sentences.chinese: 迈克坐在露茜和海伦中间。

sentences.english: Tom is between lucy and lily.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆在露茜和莉莉中间。

sentences.english: Their names were Linda, Lucy, Monica, Vivian and Jessica.
sentences.chinese: 她们分别是琳达，露茜，莫尼卡，薇薇安和杰希卡。

sentences.english: All her friends sing Lucy a birthday song.
sentences.chinese: 所有朋友给露茜唱生日歌。
露茜是一个十一岁的女孩。

sentences.english: This is Lucy, the youngest of the Pevensies.
sentences.chinese: 这是露茜，在四兄妹中年龄最小。

sentences.english: Lucy didn't attend the class this morning.
sentences.chinese: 露茜今天早晨没有上课。

sentences.english: Tom and Lucy chased around a lot together recently.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆和露茜两人近来过从甚密。

definition: Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
Niya, ancient kingdom near Khotan in Xinjiang, 1st century BC-4th century AD
